charges.charge_description: 21 U.S.C. §§ 841(a) (1) and (b) ( 1 ) ( C) - Distributed a mixture  or substance containing  a detectable amount of  heroin, a Schedule I  controlled substance(1)

COUNT I:  Conspiracy to knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute and to distribute a controlled substance, namely: in excess of 100 grams of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of heroin, a Schedule I Controlled Substance, in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B)(i)  and 846

charges.charge_offence_description: COUNT I:  Conspiracy to knowingly and intentionall
